response.overview: A collective portrait presenting fifteen protagonists from India who live and work in Warsaw and the surrounding area. The film shows their lives from an intimate perspective. The camera accompanies them in everyday situations, both at work and at home with their families, revealing the true image of immigrantsâ€”their problems and their feelings about living in the capital of Poland. How do they integrate into a society that for many years was not open to immigrants? How do they cope with Polish culture? What makes them want to live in Poland?
response.title: DAL
